TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_u_dadiw_nu_Sakizaya_makazateng, title = u_dadiw_nu_Sakizaya_makazateng, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/u_dadiw_nu_Sakizaya_makazateng} }

S.FORM: == u dadiw nu Sakizaya - makazateng == misangaay tu sulit nu Sakizaya: ci Tubah 徐成丸 族語詞 misangaay tu sulit nu Hulam: ci Lisin Cudad 李秀蘭 中文詞 u sulit nu dadiw: yu makazateng tisuwan muwangic. maydih muwangic miawaw kisu tu. cay ku kapulkal a adingu mahiza malalemetay. nu sadinsin udad titih. a pauzip tu kanatal. a! makazateng kisu mizateng cay kaydih. a mapawan uyzasa mazateng tu a simsimman pabelien tu uzip tawya. misabaluh mulekal a icelang.

== o dadiw no Sakizaya - makazateng == misangaay to solit no Sakizaya: ci Tobah 徐成丸 族語詞 misangaay to solit no Holam: ci Lisin Codad 李秀蘭 中文詞 o solit no dadiw: yo makazateng tisowan mowangic. maydih mowangic miawaw kiso to. cay ko kapolkal a adingo mahiza malalemetay. no sadinsin odad titih. a paozip to kanatal. a! makazateng kiso mizateng cay kaydih. a mapawan oyzasa mazateng to a simsimman pabelien to ozip tawya. misabaloh molekal a icelang.
